snippet: In a commentary, the editors at Bloomberg View chastise what they see as Greg Smith's naïveté. "It must have been a terrible shock when Smith concluded that Goldman actually was primarily about making money," the editors write.
abstract: In a commentary, the editors at Bloomberg View chastise what they see as Greg Smith's naïveté. "It must have been a terrible shock when Smith concluded that Goldman actually was primarily about making money," the editors write.

headline.main: Bloomberg View: Yes, Mr. Smith, Goldman Sachs Is All About Making Money
